text:
e="preserve">Arthur Henry Brind (4 July 1927 – 3 November 2020) was a British politician. He was in the Gold Coast (later Ghana) until 1960. Brind was Ambassador to Somalia from 1977 until 1980. He was also High Commissioner to Malawi from 1983 until 1987.
Brind died on 3 November 2020 at the age of 93.
